casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Jarret Jean MCCASLAND NO. 2017-K-0823 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 21, 2018

Reconsideration denied.

JOHNSON, C J., would grant reconsideration and consider the merits.

HUGHES, J., would grant reconsideration and consider the merits.

CRICHTON, J., would grant reconsideration and consider the merits.
